info.title: My API
info.description: This project database using TPT (Table-per-Type) design, because of the complexity of the data structure, from the User has been extended down to use syquelize as a communication with postgreSql. 這邊文檔命名都是大寫為後端js Model的name

tags.name: User
tags.description: 1.hasOne(Admin),hasMany(Merchant),hasMany(Image) 2.id, name, email, password, phoneNumber, address, role[customer, merchant, admin]

tags.name: Merchant
tags.description: 1.belongsto(User),hasMany(Menu),hasMany(ProductOption),hasMany(MerchantCategory),belongtoMany(ProductCategory),belongto(Image) 2.id, user_id, business_name, description, feature, merchant_logo(abandoned), location, image_id , business_hours

tags.name: Image
tags.description: 1.belongto(User),hasMany(MerchantCategoryMain),hasMany(Merchant) 2.id, filename, url, user_id, width, height, size, mime_type,timespace

tags.name: Product
tags.description: 1.belongsto(Menu), belongsToMany(ProductCategory), belongsToMany(ProductOption) 2.id, name, description, price, menu_id

tags.name: ProductImage
tags.description: 中介表：Product and Image relation table。1. BelongsTo(Product), BelongsTo(Image) 2. 欄位：product_id(UUID), image_id(UUID), sort_order(int), is_main(boolean, default: false), created_at(timestamptz), updated_at(timestamptz)

tags.name: ProductOption
tags.description: 中介表：Product and Option relation table。1. BelongsTo(Product), BelongsTo(Option) 2. 欄位：id, product_id, option_id, required(boolean), sort_order(int), created_at, updated_at

tags.name: Option
tags.description: 商品選項定義。1. HasMany(OptionValue), BelongsToMany(Product through ProductOption), HasMany(OptionCategory) 2. 欄位：id, name, type(enum: select, checkbox, text, number), description(text), min_select(int), max_select(int), user_id(UUID), merchant_id(UUID), is_global(boolean), created_at, updated_at

tags.name: OptionValue
tags.description: Option 對應的具體值（選項值）。1. BelongsTo(Option) 2. 欄位：id, option_id, values(string), extra_price(float), is_default(boolean), sort_order(int), created_at, updated_at

tags.name: Option_Category
tags.description: 中介表：Option 與 O_Category 的關聯表。1. BelongsTo(Option), BelongsTo(O_Category) 2. 欄位：id, option_id, o_category_id, created_at, updated_at

tags.name: O_Category
tags.description: Option 分類標籤表，用於分類 Option。1. HasMany(OptionCategory) 2. 欄位：id, name, description, created_at, updated_at

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: role Can be filled in(customer, merchant, admin)

get.summary: Get All Merchant by User Id
取得某類別的所有商家
取得某類別下商家的數量

post.summary: create admin,set user role to admin(Originally for customer),enter user_id
post.description: before create you need to login by admin user

get.summary: get single admin data(return user date),enter user_id

delete.summary: delete admin and set user role to customer(Originally for admin),enter user_id

get.summary: Find all the menus of a merchant, Enter merchant_id

delete.summary: Delete menu,Enter menu_id,All data related to the product will be deleted.

get.summary: Query all products containing menu_id,Enter menu_id
Check all the menus and products of a particular merchant. Enter merchant_id
get all images by propduct id
Get option by product_id or option_id

post.summary: Use upload file to post image, and then save it to Google Cloud Storage

get.summary: Get images by user ID with pagination
